name: Futanari Sex - Locker Room Affair
description:
About the game
An erotic visual novel about two gorgeous cheerleaders after a day of practice. Everything takes a turn when the secretly futanari starts taking pictures of her naked teammate.
Visual Novel Description
With exceptional looks and big personalities, Tiffany and Sabrina are cheerleaders for a popular football team.
After a tiring day of jumps, tumbling and stunting the girls retire to the locker room to change.
The two start fooling around, try on the new uniforms and take pictures, getting lost in the moment.
Although they are used to seeing each other naked all the time, Sabrina can no longer control her urges and surprises Tiffany with what she’s hiding in her panties.
Features
- 50+ HD renders
- Animations
